entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
